Your Task

  • Work on projects for our international customers within an international team together with colleagues from our American and Korean offices
  • Be responsible for parts of the project
  • Design and implementation of web applications,mobile applications
  • Collaboration on requirement analysis and specifications
  • Sharing knowledge and experience with other colleagues

Requirements

  • Good knowledge of Agile processes, implement TDD, BDD
  • Adaptability, rapid learning technology to implement the project
  • Good understanding of Object-oriented programming
  • Good knowledge about HTML5, Javascript, CSS3, Java
  • Experienced in MySQL or NoSQL (MongoDB,...)
  • Work with Framework: Liferay.

What We Offer

  • Great workspace
    •
  • Chances of self-development
    •
  • Lifetime opportunities
    •

Work Environment

  • Time: 9 a.m - 6p.m h, Monday to Friday, 01 hour for lunch break.
  • Team building activities on Saturday morning.
  • On Friday, the last week of every month: implement the staff's own idea.

Lung Vang Company aims to be key integrated service provider tooled with its unparalleled intellectual capital and unmatched global capability.
